description.value:
A spellstriker staff is wrought iron with gleaming arcane sigils etched into its surface and a sharp point at the bottom. Used as a weapon, the staff is a +1 striking shifting staff.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] take 1d6 damage per rank of the spell, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] instead of Reflex.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Produce Flame]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Echoing Weapon], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sure Strike]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Acid Arrow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Maneuver]

Craft Requirements You have the magus's Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
